Several traditional Rabelo boats with dark hulls, red and white cabins, and distinctive yellow rudders are moored at a stone quay next to the calm, dark water. A small, simple blue boat is also moored to the quay. On the left, multiple multi-story buildings with numerous windows line the street along the edge of the harbor. A pair of hands raises a black camera into the view, framing a photograph of the boats against the misty backdrop.

The deep blue Adriatic Sea fills the view, with the large, green, forested island of Lokrum situated prominently offshore. A white cruise ship and several smaller boats are visible on the water's surface. As the camera moves, it reveals the historic walled city, a dense cluster of buildings with orange-red terracotta roofs, enclosed by massive, light-colored stone walls. A harbor with numerous docked boats is nestled against the city. The foreground is a rugged hillside with green pine trees and rocky, brown earth. The warm, golden light of the rising sun illuminates the historic architecture and reflects off the calm water of the Venetian Lagoon, where numerous gondolas are neatly moored. In the distance, a tall rectangular building with a red body and white top stands out, while a crowd gathers in St. Mark's Square, adding life to the scene.

The main window, titled "HYPNOSPACE EXPLORER," initially displays the "Home Page of Dylan Merchant," which features green text on a dark background discussing an audio player called "DM_Tunebox" and a "SECRET PROJECT." A white arrow cursor navigates the screen, performing a search for the term "badguy." The search results lead to a new page with a slim rectangular block in red and brown at the top, displaying "NO VIOLATION POINTS" on one end and "MODEL CITIZEN" on the other. Below this, the page displays the words "ILLEGAL CONTENT" in large red letters above three pixelated images of angels on a black background. The system's top bar shows the date as "1999.11.05." Tags such as "hypnospace," "illegalcontent," and "badguy" are visible in a sidebar on the different pages.

subject.initial_feedback:
1，
"At first, she has long hair that appears to be tied back, with curtain bangs framing her forehead and a small butterfly-shaped hairpin. She is dressed in a traditional Chinese outfit with a high collar and short sleeves, resembling a qipao."

2，
"Next, the scene shifts — her hair becomes medium-length and flows freely over her shoulders. She brushes it back and wears large earrings, and her facial features and makeup transition from an East Asian style to an Indian style."

3，
"Her inner garment changes to a short-sleeved, midriff-baring top, with a long piece of fabric draped over one shoulder and wrapped around her waist, resembling a sari."

4，
"She then adjusts it, lifting the back part of the sari forward and upward with her left hand to fan it out."

5，
"In addition, her facial features and makeup shift from an East Asian look to an Indian one."
subject.gpt_feedback:
1. Initially, the woman is depicted with long hair that seems to be tied back, with curtain bangs framing her forehead and adorned with a small butterfly-shaped hairpin. She is wearing a traditional Chinese outfit with a high collar and short sleeves, similar to a qipao.

2. As the scene progresses, her hair transforms to a medium length, flowing freely over her shoulders. She brushes it back and dons large earrings. Her facial features and makeup transition from an East Asian style to an Indian style.

3. Her attire changes to a short-sleeved, midriff-baring top, complemented by a long piece of fabric draped over one shoulder and wrapped around her waist, resembling a sari.

4. She then adjusts the sari, lifting the back part forward and upward with her left hand to fan it out.

5. Additionally, her facial features and makeup shift from an East Asian appearance to an Indian one.

3，Through the unopened translucent section of the door, a deeper and softer reflection of the same harbor can be seen.
